title: So, at MSI..
body: My friends and I are going.. And one of them REFUSES to chant TSM. HOW DARE HE. Faker-senpai smite him.

replies.body:
Is he 'Merican?


I GUESS NOT OMG GET OUT THE PITCHFORKS! {{champion:267}}

You've been {{champion:63}}ed a {{champion:48}} .
{{champion:412}} has Sentenced you to life in a Box with nothing but {{champion:99}} laughs to fill the time, for eternity.

> [{quoted}](name=Vixanys,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=ustAEbYm,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-05-07T05:14:15.959+0000)
>
> You've been {{champion:63}}ed a {{champion:48}} .
> {{champion:412}} has Sentenced you to life in a Box with nothing but {{champion:99}} laughs to fill the time, for eternity.

{{champion:114}} 'touché on that post my friend... 'touché...
I might be a bit drunk. So I apologize for ruining your dominance of the eSports Forum!

> [{quoted}](name=Vixanys,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=ustAEbYm,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-07T05:18:43.915+0000)
>
> I might be a bit drunk. So I apologize for ruining your dominance of the eSports Forum!

You should check out the rest of the forums (not Esports):  I am way past this sub forum... Reason RIOT is "after me" right; right....


BTW don't forget your selfe with HUNI+HUG this weekend!

> [{quoted}](name=TheGrandAlliance,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=ustAEbYm,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-07T05:26:06.905+0000)
>
> You should check out the rest of the forums (not Esports):  I am way past this sub forum... Reason RIOT is "after me" right; right....
> 
> 
> BTW don't forget your selfe with HUNI+HUG this weekend!

I'm supposed to take a selfie with Huni?!?! When was this announced?! I thought you wanted me to tell Dyrus to play some league instead of taking the enemy jungler on a camping trip?

> [{quoted}](name=Vixanys,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=ustAEbYm,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-07T05:32:47.808+0000)
>
> I'm supposed to take a selfie with Huni?!?! When was this announced?! I thought you wanted me to tell Dyrus to play some league instead of taking the enemy jungler on a camping trip?

IDK well you could do both LoL.

I got the idea when watching this week's PTL (perhaps you haven't seen). WHen Huni was interviewed he suggested that (as being voted "most huggable") that we would "hug anyone".

Alas the Dryus stuff is all good... assuming TSM doesn't get eliminated in the group stage :)
